fields.content: <object width="{{ media.width }}" height="{{ media.height }}"><param name="movie" value="{{ media.get_absolute_url }}"><embed src="{{ media.get_absolute_url }}" width="{{ media.width }}" height="{{ media.height }}"></embed></object>
